content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for considering my apartment. I am looking to rent it out for the highest price possible, so I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What price are you willing to pay for a 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I propose 500 Euro per month.

Please let me know if that is too high or too low.

Personally, I am looking to rent this apartment for 450 Euro per month.

I am willing to negotiate, but I want to rent this apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Bo Li

content: I see, thank you for your proposal. 500 Euros per month is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment, but I would be looking for a slightly lower price. 450 Euros per month would be more in line with what I am looking for. Is there any room for negotiation on the price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate on the price, but I am not willing to go below 450 Euros per month.

I would like to say that I am responsible and dependable, and I would like to maintain a good relationship with my landlord.

Do you agree?
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate. 450 Euros per month is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment, and I understand your desire to maintain a good relationship with your landlord. I can accept the rental price of 450 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 450 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
